text: Yā pana bhikkhunī alaṃ tāva te ayye vuṭṭhāpitenā ti vuccamānā sādhū ti paṭissuṇitvā sā pacchā khiyyanadhammaṃ āpajjeyya pācittiyaṃ
edit: Yā pana bhikkhunī alaṃ tāva te ayye vuṭṭhāpitenā ti vuccamānā sādhū ti paṭissuṇitvā sā pacchā khiyyanadhammaṃ āpajjeyya pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: 76. Should any bhikkhunī — having been told, "Enough, lady, of your sponsoring (Acceptance) for the time being," and having answered, "Very well" — later complain, it is to be confessed.
